text: Sujit Bose is an Indian politician who is serving as Minister in the Government of West Bengal. And associated with the political party All India Trinamool Congress (AITC). Since 2011 he has been serving as the MLA of Bidhannagar Assembly constituency and also as a member of the West Bengal Legislative Assembly. == References == Category:1962 births Category:Indian politicians Category:Trinamool Congress politicians Category:Living people
title: Sujit Bose (politician)
